書名: 彰化縣民間文學集9—故事篇（五）

段: 講古早古早，有一對翁婆，老翁婆，非常散赤，逐工都愛去山頂拾柴來度三頓。啊這對老翁婆仔，年紀亦成老，啊伊總共生了十个，十个囝仔；啊這十个囝仔hah，攏有特殊的，的這才能。啊我這先介紹hah，這十个囝仔的特殊的hiong5才能是啥物。

Kong2 kou2-cha2 kou2-cha2, u7 chit8 tui3 ang-po5, lau7-ang-po5, in hui-siong5 san3-chhiah, tak8-kang to ai3 khi3 soann-teng2 khioh-chha5 lai5 tou7 sann-tng3. Ah chit tui3 lau7-ang-po5-a2, ni5-ki2 ia7 chiann5 lau7, ah i chong2 ka7 senn liau2 chap8 e5, chap8 e5 gin2-a2; ah che chap8 e5 gin2-a2 hah, long2 u7 tek8-su5 e5, e5 che chai5-leng5. Ah goa2 che seng kai3-siau7 hah, che chap8 e5 gin2-a2 e5 tek8-su5 e5 hiong5 chai5-leng5 si7 siann2-mih.
這老大的hah，伊目睭會用看千里hah，真金hah，會用看成遠hah。老二的，啊，是順風耳，啊，千里遠的所在hah，發生啥物代誌伊攏聽到一清二楚。這老三的hah，是銅頭hah，頭若銅牆鐵壁安呢，重硞硞。老四的是，這號做鐵骨身。第五的韌皮。第六的是長手li7的。第七的，大腳婆的。第八的，闊嘴的。啊第九的是大目眶的。啊第十的是，尚草猴的，擱愛臭彈的，hah，臭彈仙。

Che lau2-toa7--e5 hah, i bak8-chiu e7-eng7 khoann3 chhian-li2 hah, chin kim hah, e7-eng7 khoann3 chiann5 hng7 hah. Lau2-ji7--e5, ah, si7 sun7-hong-ni2, ah, chhian-li2 hng7 e5 sou2-chai7 hah, hoat-seng siann2-mih tai7-chi3 i long2 thiann kau3 it-chheng-ji7-chho2. Che lau2-sann-e5 hah, si7 tang5-thau5 hah, thau5 na2 tang5-chhiunn5 thih-piah an2-ne, tang7-khok-khok. Lau2-si3--e5 si7, che ho7-cho3 thih-kut-sin. Te7-gou7--e5 jun7-phoe5. Te7-lak8--e5 si7 tng5-chhiu2-li7 e5. Te7-chhit--e5, toa7-kha-po5 e5. Te7-peh--e5, khoah-chhui3 e5. Ah te7-kau2--e5 si7 toa7-bak8-khou e5. Ah te7-chap8--e5 si7, siong7 chhau2-kau5 e5, koh ai3 chhau3-toann7 e5, hah, chhau3-toann7-sian.

啊這十个兄弟仔hah，平常時hah，日子攏過到成快樂，逐个攏hah，鬥陣去拾柴hah，啊鬥陣彳亍。日子，日子一工直直過，這的囝仔一工一工直直大來，hah。有一工，這老翁婆hah，伊就叫這的這十个囝仔講：「E3，子啊子，啊，您爸仔您母仔今也年紀亦成大啊，啊您就愛家己會曉，家己會曉，鬥做工課。啊，所以今仔日hah，由您十个兄弟仔去山頂hah，去拾柴轉來，才提去賣，咱才有錢通好買其他的物件轉來使用。」啊這十个兄弟仔hah，oan5-a2成有孝，聽了話之後，就逐个就相招來到這山頂去拾柴。

Ah chit chap8 e5 hiann-ti7-a2 hah, peng5-siong5-si5 hah, jit8-chi2 long2 koe3 kau3 chiann5 khoai3-lok8, tak8-e5 long2 hah, tau3-tin7 khi3 khioh-chha5 hah, ah tau3-tin7 chhit-tho5. Jit8-chi2, jit8-chi2 chit8 kang tit8-tit8 koe3, chit e5 gin2-a2 chit8 kang chit8 kang tit8-tit8 toa7 lai5, hah. u7 chit8 kang, che lau7-ang-po5 hah, i to7 kio3 chit e5 chit chap8 e5 gin2-a2 kong2: “E3, kiann2 ah kiann2 , ah, lin2 pa5-a2 lin2 bu2-a2 chit-ma2 ni5-ki2 ia7 chiann5 toa7 ah, ah lin2 to7 ai3 ka-ti7 e7-hiau2, ka-ti7 e7-hiau2, tau3 cho3 khang-khoe3. Ah, sou2-i2 kin-a2-jit8 hah, iu5 lin2 chap8 e5 hiann-ti7-a2 khi3 soann-teng2 hah, khi3 khioh-chha5 tng2--lai5, chiah theh8 khi3 be7, lan2 chiah u7 chinn5 thang ho2 be2 ki5-tha e5 mih8-kiann7 tng2 lai5 su2-iong7.” Ah chit chap8 e5 hiann-ti7-a2 hah, oan5-a2 chiann5 iu2-hau3, thiann liau2 oe7 chi-au7, to7 tak8-e5 to7 sio-chio lai5 kau3 che soann-teng2 khi3 khioh-chha5.
逐个拾柴拾柴，這的十兄弟仔hah，無注意著，去得罪著這山賊這的，山賊，山的濟這山賊，啊這山賊啊，就真受氣。伊就知影這是山腳這戶，這拾柴這老翁婆生的這十个囝仔，hah。今也，這十个囝仔聽著山賊卜共掠，逐个緊拚性命緊走轉來，走轉來厝e5啊。走轉來厝以後，e3，這掠頭一个去，掠這尚細漢的這个，尚愛臭彈仙。

Tak8-e5 khioh-chha5 khioh-chha5, chit e5 chap8 hiann-ti7-a2 hah, bo5 chu3-i3 tioh8, khi3 tek-choe7 tioh8 che soann-chhat8 chit e5, soann-chhat8, soann e5 che7 che soann-chhat8, ah che soann-chhat8 ah, to7 chin siu7-khi3. I to7 chai-iann2 che si7 soann-kha chit hou7, che khioh-chha5 che lau7-ang-po5 in senn e5 chit chap8 e5 gin2-a2, hah. In chit-ma2, chit chap8 e5 gin2-a2 thiann tioh8 soann-chhat8 beh ka7 liah8, tak8-e5 kin2 piann3 senn3-mia7 kin2 chau2--tng2-lai5, chau2 tng2 lai5 chhu3 e5 ah. Chau2 tng2 lai5 chhu3 i2-au7, e3, che liah8 thau5-chit8 e5 khi3, liah8 che siong7 se3-han3 e5 chit e5, siong7 ai3 chhau3-toann7-sian.
這个臭彈仙去予掠去，伊就，啊，去就[立+店]彼臭彈，啊，臭彈東臭彈西，予這山賊笑到，笑到落下頦，笑到hah，予腹肚安呢，mouh leh一直笑安呢。好，這个老細的，伊就請，趁無注意的時陣偷走轉來。

Chit e5 chhau3-toann7-sian khi3 hou7 liah8 khi3, i to7, ah, khi3 to7 tiam3 hia chhau3-toann7, ah, chhau3-toann7 tang chhau3-toann7 sai, hou7 che soann-chhat8 chhio3 kah, chhio3 kah lau3-e7-hai5, chhio3 kah hah, hou7 pak-tou2 an2-ne, mouh leh it-tit8 chhio3 an2-ne. Ho2, chit e5 lau2-se3-e5, i to7 chhiann2, than3 in bo5 chu3-i3 e5 si5-chun7 thau-chau2--tng2-lai5.

偷走轉來的時陣，這的山賊啊，就非常受氣。啊，伊就想講，就呼，就得參詳。啊突然佇這爿這山腳這老翁婆厝hah，這老大的千里眼突然遠遠看著，看著這山賊的住厝的方向hah，hiang2-hiang2仔大軍前來，安呢乒乓叫安呢，成歹的模樣。啊就講：「Ai5，無逐个緊叫這老二的，緊來聽看覓，到底是得講啥物？到底幾个人？共聽看覓。」啊這老二的hah，伊是耳仔成利hah，伊安呢，用耳仔共聽過，伊就聽，哦，佇不遠千里的所在hah，有一批這的山賊，那走那刣講：「好！掠來刣予死！掠來刣予死！毋好放走！」安呢直直那行那喝。呼，這順風耳就共伊聽的話hah，共全家人講。

Thau-chau2--tng2-lai5 e5 si5-chun7, chit e5 soann-chhat8 ah, to7 hui-siong5 siu7-khi3. Ah, i to7 siunn7 kong2, in to7 honn3, to7 teh chham-siong5. Ah tut8-jian5 ti7 chit peng5 che soann-kha che lau7-ang-po5 in chhu3 hah, che lau2-toa7--e5 chhian-li2-gan2 tut8-jian5 hng7-hng7 khoann3 tioh8, khoann3 tioh8 che soann-chhat8 e5 toa3 in chhu3 e5 hong-hiong3 hah, hiang2-hiang2-a2 toa7-kun chian5-lai5, an2-ne pin3-piang3-kio3 an2-ne, chiann5 phainn2 e5 bou5-iunn7. Ah in to7 kong2: “Ai5, bo5 in tak8-e5 kin2 kio3 che lau2-ji7--e5, kin2 lai5 thiann khoann3 mai7, tau3-te2 in si7 teh kong2 siann2-mih? Tau3-te2 kui2 e5 lang5? Ka7 thiann khoann3 mai7.” Ah che lau2-ji7--e5 hah, i si7 hi7-a2 chiann5 lai7 hah, i an2-ne, eng7 hi7-a2 ka7 thiann koe3, i to7 thiann, ou5, ti7 put-oan2 chhian-li2 e5 sou2-chai7 hah, u7 chit8 phoe chit e5 soann-chhat8, in na2 chau2 na2 thai5 kong2: “Ho2! Liah8 lai5 thai5 hou7 si2! Liah8 lai5 thai5 hou7 si2! M7 ho2 pang3 in chau2!” An2-ne tit8-tit8 na2 kiann5 na2 hoah. Honn3, che sun7-hong-ni2 to7 ka7 i thiann e5 oe7 hah, ka7 choan5-ke lang5 kong2.

啊來到遮的時陣，逐个攏去宓起來，賸這號做銅頭，銅牆鐵壁這呼，頭若銅牆鐵壁這，去賸遮。啊山賊看伊遮choann-a2共掠轉去。掠轉去到山寨的時陣，山賊就講：「哦，你這个成可惡，你竟然hah，竟然敢得罪阮hah。所以hah，卜共你掠起來，來共縛縛咧，卜來斬頭，掟粗糠。」卜共斬頭示眾。結果hah，就叫人安呢，呼，安呢直直刜直直刜，就是無法度共這个，這个老三的銅頭這个共刜落。啊這山賊就非常受氣，講：「哦！我毋捌看人這頭攏硬的安呢，攏teng7的。刜歸晡猶刜落去，含彼刀hah，攏刜斷，刜斷幾仔枝。」哦，就擱想一个辦法，就住彼開會。

Ah in lai5 kau3 chia e5 si5-chun7, tak8-e5 long2 khi3 bih--khi2-lai5, chhun che ho7-cho3 tang5-thau5, tang5-chhiunn5 thih-piah che honn3, thau5 na2 tang5-chhiunn5 thih-piah che, khi3 chhun chia. Ah soann-chhat8 khoann3 i chiah choann-a2 ka7 liah8--tng2-khi3. Liah8 tng2 khi3 kau3 soann-che3 e5 si5-chun7, soann-chhat8 to7 kong2: “Ou5, li2 chit e5 chiann5 kho2-onn3, li2 keng3-jian5 hah, keng3-jian5 kann2 tek-choe7 goan2 hah. Sou2-i2 hah, beh ka7 li2 liah8--khi2-lai5, lai5 ka7 pak8-pak8 leh, beh lai5 cham2-thau5, tenn7 chhou-khng.” Beh ka7 cham2-thau5 si7-chiong3. Kiat-ko2 hah, in to7 kio3 lang5 an2-ne, honn3, an2-ne tit8-tit8 phuttit8-tit8 phut, to7 si7 bo5 hoat-tou7 ka7 chit e5, chit e5 lau2-sann-e5 tang5-thau5 chit e5 ka7 phut loh8. Ah che soann-chhat8 in to7 hui-siong5 siu7-khi3, kong2: “Ou5! Goa2 m7 bat khoann3 lang5 che thau5 long2 teng7 e5 an2-ne, long2 teng7 e5. Phut kui-pou iau2 phut be7 loh8--khi3, ham7 he to hah, long2 phut tng7, phut tng7 kui2-a7 ki.” Ou5, in to7 koh siunn7 chit8 e5 pan7-hoat, in to7 toa3 hia khui-hoe7.

一个山賊伊就講：「好！既然無法度用刀共刜死，咱歸氣hah，用放火來共燒，來共戲弄。」啊，這个老三聽了呼，就真驚惶，伊講：「哇，卜用火燒，啊毋choann-a2變一个被火紋身的人，哦，啊毋就歸身軀臭火乾去。」所以驚了，真驚惶。Choann-a2想講，choann-a2，苦苦共，伊choann-a2，心內一急choann-a2，心生一个妙計講：「E7，這的，e7，老大的啊hah，山頭的老大的hah，請拜託，因為阮厝的老父老母hah，算年紀成大hah，我有一个小小的要求，希望佇我卜予您處斬以前hah，卜予您處死以前hah，請您放我轉去看阮父母了我自動就會轉來。」這的山賊啊，逐个看伊安呢攏有孝心hah，所以就同意hah，放伊轉去。

Chit8 e5 soann-chhat8 i to7 kong2: “Ho2! Ki3-jian5 bo5 hoat-tou7 eng7 to ka7 phut-si2, lan2 kui-khi3 hah, eng7 pang3-hoe2 lai5 ka7 sio, lai5 ka7 hi2-lang7.” Ah, chit e5 lau2-sann thiann liau2 honn3, to7 chin kiann-hiann5, i kong2: “Oah, beh eng7 hoe2 sio, ah m7 choann-a2 pian3 chit8 e5 pi7 hoe2 bun5-sin e5 lang5, ou5, ah m7 to7 kui sin-khu chhau3-hoe2-ta khi3.” Sou2-i2 kiann liau2, chin kiann-hiann5. Choann-a2 siunn7 kong2, choann-a2, khou2-khou2 ka7, i choann-a2, sim-lai7 it kip choann-a2, sim senn chit8 e5 biau7-ke3 kong2: “E7, chit e5, e7, lau2-toa7--e5 ah hah, soann-thau5 e5 lau2-toa7--e5 hah, chhiann2 pai3-thok, in-ui7 goan2 chhu3 e5 lau7-pe7 lau7-bu2 hah, sng3 ni5-ki2 chiann5 toa7 hah, goa2 u7 chit8 e5 sio2-sio2 e5 iau-kiu5, hi-bang7 ti7 goa2 beh hou7 lin2 chhu2-cham2 i2-cheng5 hah, beh hou7 lin2 chhu2-si2 i2-cheng5 hah, chhiann2 lin2 pang3 goa2 tng2--khi3 khoann3 goan2 pe7-bu2 liau2 goa2 chu7-tong7 to7 e7 tng2--lai5.” Chit e5 soann-chhat8 ah, tak8-e5 khoann3 i an2-ne long2 iu2-hau3-sim hah, sou2-i2 to7 tong5-i3 hah, pang3 i tng2--khi3.
啊伊就緊轉去，轉去到厝hah，伊就共這情況共伊這的兄弟姊妹父母講。啊講了逐个參詳好，既然卜用火燒，就請這个第四个這个鐵骨身的這个去。

Ah i to7 kin2 tng2--khi3, tng2 khi3 kau3 chhu3 hah, i to7 ka7 che cheng5-hong2 ka7 i chit e5 hiann-ti7 chi2-moe7 pe7-bu2 kong2. Ah kong2 liau2 tak8-e5 chham-siong5 ho2, ki3-jian5 beh eng7 hoe2 sio, to7 chhiann2 chit e5 te7-si3--e5 chit e5 thih-kut-sin e5 chit e5 khi3.

啊鐵骨身去，呼，這的山賊逐个就用四五鼎的彼炎火，安呢用彼油鍋安呢hah，用彼鐵[月+片]落烘烘到燒燙燙安呢，卜來共烰，卜來共焠。結果那會知，那有，安怎焠hah，攏無法度，無法度共伊身軀hah傷著。所以這山賊啦，麼是成受氣，伊麼感覺成奇怪，e7，這个人那會千燒亦燒死，亦無，亦燒膨泡hah，猶擱原在安呢。所以，有一个山賊hah，伊就講：「好！既然亦無法度斬頭，亦無法度共燒死，咱歸氣共剝皮，看伊皮啊偌蠻皮偌厚hah！」結果hah，伊聽著，這鐵骨身聽著伊卜剝皮，hah，伊就hah，皮像安呢，伊就講，aih，伊就oan5-a2想一个計講：「哎！我oan5-a2想卜轉去一下hah，希望您會用答應我這个要求。」這山賊想講，反正早慢卜予阮剝皮，啊，要緊，就放伊轉去。

Ah thih-kut-sin khi3, honn3, chit e5 soann-chhat8 tak8-e5 to7 eng7 si3 gou7 tiann2 e5 he iam7-hoe2, an2-ne eng7 he iu5-oe an2-ne hah, eng7 he thih-phiann2 loh8 hang-hang kau3 sio-thng3-thng3 an2-ne, beh lai5 ka7 pu5, beh lai5 ka7 chhuh. Kiat-ko2 nah e7 chai, nah u7, an2-choann2 chhuh hah, long2 bo5 hoat-tou7, bo5 hoat-tou7 ka7 i sin-khu hah siong tioh8. Sou2-i2 che soann-chhat8 lah, ma7 si7 chiann5 siu7-khi3, i ma7 kam2-kak chiann5 ki5-koai3, e7, chit e5 lang5 nah e7 sian sio ia7 sio be7 si2, ia7 bo5, ia7 sio be7 phong3-pha7 hah, iau2-koh goan5-chai7 an2-ne. Sou2-i2, u7 chit8 e5 soann-chhat8 hah, i to7 kong2: “Ho2! Ki3-jian5 ia7 bo5 hoat-tou7 cham2-thau5, ia7 bo5 hoat-tou7 ka7 sio-si2, lan2 kui-khi3 ka7 pak-phoe5, khoann3 i phoe5 ah joa7 ban5-phoe5 joa7 kau7 hah!” Kiat-ko2 hah, i thiann tioh8, che thih-kut-sin thiann tioh8 i beh pak-phoe5, hah, i to7 hah, phoe5 chhiunn7 an2-ne, i to7 kong2, aih, i to7 oan5-a2 siunn7 chit8 e5 ke3 kong2: “Aih! Goa2 oan5-a2 siunn7 beh tng2--khi3 chit8-e7 hah, hi-bang7 lin2 e7-eng7 tap-eng3 goa2 chit e5 iau-kiu5.” Che soann-chhat8 siunn7 kong2, hoan2-cheng3 cha2-ban7 beh hou7 goan2 pak-phoe5, ah, be7 iau3-kin2, to7 pang3 i tng2--khi3.

這鐵骨身轉去啊，oan5-a2共這情況共厝的這父母，猶擱這的兄弟共講予清楚。逐个想卜剝皮啊，就派這老五的。E7，這老五的hah，伊皮成韌。啊到彼以後hah，這山賊，逐个就安呢oan5-a2 chhih8偎來卜來剝皮，啊那會知，千剝pi7剝，攏無法度共伊皮hah，共伊，安呢hah，剝振動。所以山賊啊，擱好笑擱好氣安呢，想講：「亦毋捌看人這攏，厚面皮的hah！生目睭亦毋捌看過！」所以，就得想講：「既然，亦無法度斬麼落，亦無法度燒死，亦無法度剝皮，啊，咱實在對伊無法啊，無法度。啊看卜安怎？啊，歸氣共填海啊，去飼魚好啦。」所以逐个就想好講：「好！安呢咱共填海。」這韌皮聽了hah，oan5-a2心驚惶，講：「哦，伊卜共填海，啊若填海loeh，伊毋choann-a2活活去予，去予淹死，去飼海魚。」伊choann-a2苦苦擱共哀求講：「哦，我oan5-a2卜轉去一下，希望佇我予您填海以前hah，你予，放予我轉去厝的看看咧。希望我尚我這个要求您會當答應。」啊這山賊伊同意呼，放伊轉去。
